name: Introduction to React JS
description: Learn the basic principles and concepts of React JS, including components, props, and state management.

lessons.name: Getting Started with React
lessons.description: Set up a React environment and create your first React component.

lessons.name: Components and Props
lessons.description: Understand the concepts of React components and how to use props to pass data.

lessons.name: State and Lifecycle
lessons.description: Explore React component lifecycle methods and manage component state.

name: React Hooks and Effects
description: Learn about React Hooks and how to use them to manage stateful logic and side effects.

lessons.name: Understanding React Hooks
lessons.description: Learn the different types of React Hooks and their usage.

lessons.name: Using useState Hook
lessons.description: Explore the useState Hook to add state to functional components.

lessons.name: Effect Hook and Lifecycle
lessons.description: Understand the Effect Hook and how it replaces lifecycle methods.

name: React Router
description: Learn how to implement client-side routing in React applications using React Router.

lessons.name: Introduction to React Router
lessons.description: Get started with React Router and set up basic routes.

lessons.name: Nested Routes and Route Parameters
lessons.description: Explore nested routes and how to pass parameters to routes.

lessons.name: Programmatic Navigation
lessons.description: Learn how to navigate programmatically in React applications.

name: Redux State Management
description: Understand the principles of Redux and how to manage application state with Redux.

lessons.name: Introduction to Redux
lessons.description: Learn the basics of Redux and its core concepts such as actions, reducers, and the store.

lessons.name: Working with Redux Store
lessons.description: Explore how to set up a Redux store and dispatch actions.

lessons.name: Async Actions and Middleware
lessons.description: Learn how to handle asynchronous actions in Redux using middleware like Redux Thunk.

name: Node JS Fundamentals
description: Learn the fundamentals of Node.js, including asynchronous programming, file system operations, and web server creation.

lessons.name: Asynchronous Programming in Node.js
lessons.description: Understand asynchronous programming in Node.js using callbacks, promises, and async/await.

lessons.name: Working with the File System
lessons.description: Learn how to read, write, and manipulate files in Node.js.

lessons.name: Creating a Web Server with Node.js
lessons.description: Use Node.js to create a simple web server and handle HTTP requests.

name: Express.js Basics
description: Explore the basics of Express.js framework for building web applications in Node.js.

lessons.name: Setting Up Express.js
lessons.description: Learn how to set up Express.js framework and create a basic server.

lessons.name: Routing in Express.js
lessons.description: Understand routing concepts in Express.js and how to handle different HTTP requests.

lessons.name: Middleware in Express.js
lessons.description: Explore middleware functions in Express.js and how to use them for request processing.

name: MongoDB Integration
description: Learn how to integrate MongoDB with Node.js for database operations.

lessons.name: Introduction to MongoDB
lessons.description: Understand the basics of MongoDB, including collections, documents, and CRUD operations.

lessons.name: Connecting to MongoDB from Node.js
lessons.description: Learn how to connect Node.js applications to MongoDB using official MongoDB driver.

lessons.name: CRUD Operations with MongoDB
lessons.description: Explore CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations with MongoDB in Node.js applications.

name: JavaScript Basics
description: Explore the basics of JavaScript programming language, including variables, data types, functions, and control flow.

lessons.name: Variables and Data Types
lessons.description: Understand JavaScript variables and different data types such as strings, numbers, and arrays.

lessons.name: Functions and Scope
lessons.description: Learn about functions, function scope, and closures in JavaScript.

lessons.name: Control Flow and Loops
lessons.description: Explore control flow statements like if-else, switch, and different types of loops in JavaScript.
